brief.content-text: The diagram depicts Cisco enterprise architectures. There are four panels labeled Campus, Branch Sites, Data Center, and Teleworker. The teleworker is connected to the campus network via broadband. the branch sites are connected to the campus network via WAN links. The campus consists of various user and network devices. Campus routers are connected to the data center routers via WAN links. The data center consists of various core network devices.
